name: Excluded Libraries Home Sections
description: Create custom home sections displaying only media with valid, accessible files. Filters out broken symlinks and missing files automatically.
overview: Create home sections with valid media files only

versions.changelog:
Initial release

- Custom home sections for Jellyfin
- Filter media by valid file sizes (excludes broken/missing files)
- Content type selection (Movies, TV Series, Music Albums)
- Multiple sorting options
- Auto-registration with Home Screen Sections plugin
- Smart grouping of episodes to series and tracks to albums
